quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words.
Deeds are fruits; words are leaves.
Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
Do not be like the cat who wanted a fish but was afraid to get his paws wet.
Nothing is easy to the unwilling.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
The reward of a thing well done, is to have done it.
Willing is not enough, we must do.

It's the action, not the fruit of the action, that's important. You have to do the right thing. It may not be in your power, may not be in your time, that there will be any fruit. But that doesn't mean you stop doing the right thing. You may never know what results come from your action. But if you do nothing, there will be no result.
The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.
Never confuse motion with action.
Be content to act, and leave the talking to others.
I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.
I never worry about action, but only inaction.
Action is the last resource of those who know not how to dream.
Action may not always bring happiness. But there is no happiness without action.
We do not need, and indeed never will have, all the answers before we act. It is often through taking action that we can discover some of them.
Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.
Well done is better than well said.
Always do more than is required of you.
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

Action hangs, as it were, dissolved in speech, in thoughts whereof speech is the shadow; and precipitates itself therefrom. The kind of speech in a man betokens the kind of action you will get from him.
Everywhere in life, the true question is not what we gain, but what we do.
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
Whatever you do may seem insignificant to you, but it is most important that you do it.
Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
For purposes of action, nothing is more useful than narrowness of thought combined with energy of will.
Action is the antidote to despair.
We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
A good action is never lost; it is a treasure laid up and guarded for the doer's need.
Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
The vision must be followed by the venture. It is not enough to stare up the steps - we must step up the stairs.
Men acquire a particular quality by constantly acting in a particular way. We become just by performing just action, temperate by performing temperate actions, brave by performing brave action.
The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
It is easy to sit up and take notice. What is difficult is getting up and taking action.
Nothing happens until something moves.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
The world can only be grasped by action, not by contemplation. The hand is the cutting edge of the mind.
I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
Your words become your actions, your actions become your habits.
The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
You need to know it's your actions that will make you a good person, not desire.
I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
I am not imposed upon by fine words; I can see what actions mean.
People are not who they say but rather who their actions reveal them to be. Be smart about it.
Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.
If your actions don't live up to your words, you have nothing to say.
Thoughts do more. Words to much. Actions do much more.
When the actions becomes frequent than the words, success becomes heavier than the dreams. Do more, say less.
The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.
Actions always have consequences!
Think about it this way--our actions speak truth our words cannot.
The smallest actions reveal the most about a heart's true color, so pay attention to them. Actions are the true words of the heart.
Our inactions, like our actions, define who we are and what are true values are.
After a while, you realize that putting your actions where your mouth makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.

We can’t sufficiently define love with our words. Therefore, the only option that we’re left with is to show it in our actions. And if our actions don’t show it, the words don’t matter. Neither does anything else.
Show the youth the consequences of their actions and why they should choose wisely.
Consequences are connected to our actions. Therefore, it is crucial to be ever conscious and aware of what we think, do, and say. Those thoughts, action, and words will literally define who we are.
Actions speak louder than words, especially the actions of bringing the loudspeaker closer to your mouth!
Actions really are louder than words, judge everyone by their ability to be as good as her/his word. Give a second chance once.
Make your words follow your actions and not the other way around.
Our actions must be directed, tempered and brought under the full authority of a greater calling.
You have that choice to do actions which make closer to your goals in life.
Your actions will show if your words are true.
The future is only as bright and as wonderful as the dreams and actions that you create.

The actions of an adult are clearly distinguishable from that of a baby. He clears every doubt without a doubt thereby proving beyond all reasonable and unreasonable doubts that his maturity is not superficial.
If you are not happy today, it is because you have not performed the right actions at the right time in the past.
Only when one is free to choose, one can be responsible for one’s actions.
There are situations that make you ask questions and actions that give you answers.
Certain emotions drive certain thoughts and actions. Knowing your emotional drivers is essential to regulate behavior.
All actions begin with a thought.
Think like a man of action, and act like a man of thought.
Your actions are loud that I can't hear what you're saying.
There are risks and costs to a program of action. But they are far less than the long-range risks and costs of comfortable inaction.
The one thing you say you will do require thousands of actions.
To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires courage.
Actions are divided into two categories - physical actions and mental actions.
Others only see a tiny part of our actions, because we usually hide our real thoughts and their intentions in realizing and avoiding possible complications.
All that happens to us is a direct consequence of our actions and the choices we have made.
Take responsibility for your actions, and bring in the fear of death as a lawyer.
A defeated mindset will never produce winning actions.
If people remembered that they must reap the negative verbal attacks and spiteful actions done against others, I believe many of their words and actions would be different.
Trying to "incorporate" the likeness and actions of others.
Actions are also contagious.
This is about how much I love you. Theres no words or actions that could ever show.
To see who were their friends or foes, and how our actions fell or rose;
It’s feelin’ kind an’ gentle to everything that’s weak, and doin’ jus’ sich actions as nearly seem to speak.
Stand for what you believe, speak less and let actions define you.
Your thoughts will become your actions.
Your actions will become reaction in others - and those reactions will mimic the original action.
Our default actions are likely to fall back to what we have seen our parents do.
I have taken great care not to laugh at human actions, not to weep at them, not to hate them, but to understand them.
We must intentionally build more character from our actions so that we can inject more character into our world.
Don't assume that the inevitable will occur by chance, for our actions and words are not meaningless exercises of free will.
One's words will always matter, but one's actions are the better indicator of the character beneath one's skin.
Our thoughts determine our actions.
A man who did not leave a mark in actions should try to leave a mark in words; but when you fail in both you shall be considered the most miserable.
A man with so many words and does not have so many actions, let the wise be afraid of him.
The largeness of a man's heart is determined by his actions.
Much discussion without actions does not make a man a warrior.
It is not what a person says that should be heard but the observation of the actions that surrounds his words.
